import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './homepage.component.scss' import {useSpring, animated} from 'react-spring' import ClusterMessage from '../../components/clusterMessage/clusterMessage.component' import Benefit from '../../components/benefit/benefit.component' import Vopsele from '../../components/Vopsele/vopsele.component' import Newsletter from '../../components/Newsletter/newsletter.component' import Parteneri from '../../components/Parteneri/parteneri.component' import Contact from '../../components/Contact/contact.component' import Seap from '../../components/Seap/seap.component' import Footer from '../../components/Footer/footer.component' import livrare from '../../assets/livrare.png' import retur from '../../assets/retur.png' import plata from '../../assets/plata.png' import consiliere from '../../assets/consiliere.png' // import TriangleLogo from '../../assets/triangle.svg' import {ReactComponent as TriangleLogo} from '../../assets/triangle.svg' export default function HomePage() { const props = useSpring( { opacity:1, from: { opacity: 0, } }) const [offsetY, setOffsetY] = useState(0); const handleScroll = () => setOffsetY(window.pageYOffset); useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); }, []); const triangle = { transform: `translateY(-${offsetY * 0.5}px)`, } const text = { opacity: 0.5, transform: `translateY(${offsetY * 0.5}px)`, } return (
{/* */}
) }
